Text: sir,thank you so much for this.living in chicago having no cable or satelite there was no way for me to see these matches.i truly thank you.im hoping that you do the 6 nations 2013 when they come around.there is NO rugby union/league/sevens footprint here in the states.again thank you.
any chance for the australia vs new zealand Bledisloe Cup from 20-10-12?if so thank you.you rock.

Hi,
Is it possible for you to upload the last Bledisloe match. There are only torrents with highlights uploaded.
I myself and I'm sure a billion rugby fans would appreciate it ;-)
